text:
[Verse]
Streetlights shining bright
Wind blows in the night
We chase the morning light
Dreams within our sight

[Verse 2]
Radio plays our song
Windows down we sing along
Moonlight guides us strong
Feels like nothing's wrong

[Chorus]
Got that midnight drive
Feeling so alive
Hearts and wheels in motion
Drowning in emotion

[Verse 3]
City fades behind
Future undefined
Moments intertwined
Beauty we can find

[Verse 4]
Hands on the wheel tight
Stars align tonight
No end to this flight
Blurring all the lines

[Chorus]
Got that midnight drive
Feeling so alive
Hearts and wheels in motion
Drowning in emotion
title: Midnight Drive
